svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 14, 2023" date: "2023-01-14"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
* Latest core devs execution call video . Notes from Ben Edgington Discussion of using
gwei and using same formats in EL/CL Capella release candidate spec
Latest core devs execution call video . Notes from Ben Edgington
* Discussion of using gwei and using same formats in EL/CL
Discussion of using gwei and using same formats in EL/CL
* Capella release candidate spec
Capella release candidate spec
* Why is Warm Coinbase (gas repricing) being added to Shapella ?
Why is Warm Coinbase (gas repricing) being added to Shapella ?
Cancun + Deneb
* KZG Ceremony is live! ~57 more days in the first general contribution period
(currently a long wait) ~2500 have already contributed. Only one contributor needs to
be honest
KZG Ceremony is live!
* ~57 more days in the first general contribution period (currently a long wait)
~57 more days in the first general contribution period (currently a long wait)
* ~2500 have already contributed. Only one contributor needs to be honest
~2500 have already contributed. Only one contributor needs to be honest
* Latest 4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence devnet4 coming up before
public testnet
Latest 4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
* devnet4 coming up before public testnet
Layer 1
* EF research AMA is a mustread from start to finish Various topics: the need for more
than just 4844 , technological solutions thwart attempted censorship , what is
Ethereum good for anyway? , coming to consensus on roadmap prioritization , minimizing
EVM changes for zkEVM , should Ethereum ossify? , synchronous composability across
zkrollups and what is the Robust Incentives Group working on?
EF research AMA is a mustread from start to finish
* Various topics: the need for more than just 4844 , technological solutions thwart
attempted censorship , what is Ethereum good for anyway? , coming to consensus on
roadmap prioritization , minimizing EVM changes for zkEVM , should Ethereum ossify? ,
synchronous composability across zkrollups and what is the Robust Incentives Group
working on?
* Lido benchmarks DVT (DVT decentralizes staking pools)
Lido benchmarks DVT (DVT decentralizes staking pools)
Client releases
* Consensus Layer Lighthouse v3.4 , high priority release. Proposer boost reorgs
should incentivize performance improvements
Consensus Layer
* Lighthouse v3.4 , high priority release. Proposer boost reorgs should incentivize
performance improvements
* Execution layer Erigon v2.34 , a few releases this week with debug trace
improvements, multicore CPU threading and MBDX upgrade
Execution layer
* Erigon v2.34 , a few releases this week with debug trace improvements, multicore CPU
threading and MBDX upgrade
MEV
* Flashbots privacy roast
Flashbots privacy roast
* Prestwich: the next 5 years of MEV
Prestwich: the next 5 years of MEV
* Crazy frontrun : frontrunner copies exploiter’s 4 previous transactions over 50+
blocks
Crazy frontrun : frontrunner copies exploiter’s 4 previous transactions over 50+
Layer 2
* Optimism and Arbitrum transactions flip Ethereum mainnet transactions
EIPs/Standards
* ERC6150 : Hierarchical NFTs
This newsletter is made possible thanks to SpeedRunEthereum.com !
Test your skills and learn how to build apps on Ethereum at SpeedRunEthereum.com .
Stuff for developers
* Hardhat and Foundry plugin v1
Hardhat and Foundry plugin v1
* Foundry toolchain now caches RPC calls in CI flows
Foundry toolchain now caches RPC calls in CI flows
* If you've deployed a contract to Mainnet, Goerli, or Sepolia before Nov 15, 2022,
you can claim 10 goerli + 10 sepolia eth
If you've deployed a contract to Mainnet, Goerli, or Sepolia before Nov 15, 2022, you
can claim 10 goerli + 10 sepolia eth
* Chugsplash : tool to deploy and upgrade smart contracts securely
Chugsplash : tool to deploy and upgrade smart contracts securely
* Turborepo starter kit : NextJS, WAGMI, Ethers, Tailwind, Hardhat, Typechain
Turborepo starter kit : NextJS, WAGMI, Ethers, Tailwind, Hardhat, Typechain
* Paul Berg on solving stack too deep
Paul Berg on solving stack too deep
* Now over 225 contracts to fork and easily deploy on Cookbook.dev
Now over 225 contracts to fork and easily deploy on Cookbook.dev
* Node health monitoring tool
Node health monitoring tool
Security
* Damn Vulnerable Defi v3
Damn Vulnerable Defi v3
* slither v0.9.2 , 2 new detectors, integrates OpenAI’s codex to generate natspec and
find bugs with GPT3
slither v0.9.2 , 2 new detectors, integrates OpenAI’s codex to generate natspec and
* Beware of Multi-block MEV and Compound Governor
Beware of Multi-block MEV and Compound Governor
* 2022 in Ethereum security review
2022 in Ethereum security review
Ecosystem
* DAOdrops : 250k USDC retroactive goods funding to be distributed via vote by 1) DAO
voters, 2) POAP holders, 3) code deployers. Nominations open now.
DAOdrops : 250k USDC retroactive goods funding to be distributed via vote by 1) DAO
* Randomness on Ethereum using SNARKs and VDFs
Randomness on Ethereum using SNARKs and VDFs
* Proof of concept to use Nym to anonymize RPC calls
Proof of concept to use Nym to anonymize RPC calls
* PeltaShield : tool to simulate your transactions via RPC call
PeltaShield : tool to simulate your transactions via RPC call
Enterprise
* Norwegian government using Arbitrum to maintain cap tables of unlisted companies
Norwegian government using Arbitrum to maintain cap tables of unlisted companies
* Société Générale withdraws 7 million Dai of its 30m Dai authorization backed by home
loan bonds
Société Générale withdraws 7 million Dai of its 30m Dai authorization backed by home
Application layer
* Zkitter : post under your username or anon, public key written to Arbitrum for
account recovery. Uses various zk tools: Interep, RLN, Semaphore
Zkitter : post under your username or anon, public key written to Arbitrum for account
recovery. Uses various zk tools: Interep, RLN, Semaphore
* chai.money back online to accrue the DSR on your Dai (currently 1%)
chai.money back online to accrue the DSR on your Dai (currently 1%)
* Get the risk-free rate onchain? Ondo to tokenize 3 different ETFs of US
treasuries/bonds and will fork Compound for its security tokens
Get the risk-free rate onchain? Ondo to tokenize 3 different ETFs of US
* Revamped Gitcoin Grants alpha round launches next week with open source, Eth infra
and climate solutions matching pools
Revamped Gitcoin Grants alpha round launches next week with open source, Eth infra and
climate solutions matching pools
* Ethunwrapp : retrospective of your onchain activity in 2022
Ethunwrapp : retrospective of your onchain activity in 2022
Job Listings
* Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
* Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
* Join a16z-backed Story Protocol as a founding smart contract developer .
Join a16z-backed Story Protocol as a founding smart contract developer .
* Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Wyre saved and processing withdrawals normally
Wyre saved and processing withdrawals normally
* Gemini accuses Genesis of fraud
Gemini accuses Genesis of fraud
* SEC charges Gemini and Genesis calling GeminiEarn a security
SEC charges Gemini and Genesis calling GeminiEarn a security
* Nexo raided by Bulgarian police
Nexo raided by Bulgarian police
* Treasury dodges Emmer inquiry over Tornado sanctions
Treasury dodges Emmer inquiry over Tornado sanctions
* Metropolitan drops crypto.com and all other crypto clients
Metropolitan drops crypto.com and all other crypto clients
General/crypto
* Benchmarking RISC Zero and Polygon Miden
Benchmarking RISC Zero and Polygon Miden
* A primer on pairings
A primer on pairings
* S𝛑PETs : private transactions using ECDSA or Schnorr
S𝛑PETs : private transactions using ECDSA or Schnorr
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
* Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
* Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
* Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
* Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
* Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
* Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
* Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
* Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
* Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
* Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
* Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
* Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
* Apr 21-23 – EthTaipei hackathon
Apr 21-23 – EthTaipei hackathon
* Apr 24-25 – EthTaipei conference
Apr 24-25 – EthTaipei conference
* May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
* Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
* Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
* Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
* Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
